text:
@realDonaldTrump Less than 5% of population, US has over a quarter of COVID19 cases & deaths. Virus was always coming but your negligence made it exponentially worse.
Social distancing & masks will slow the spread.
No one has taken over any cities
Learn to spell. Wimpier?
#ObamaAppreciationDay

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
